v2.headline: Helping Service-based Business & Solopreneurs Grow and Scale Business with High-ticket Sales | Building Brands for B2B | LinkedIn Lead Generation through Content & Scalable systems. ðŸ”” Founder @Brandscale
v2.about:
Over the last 5 years, I've helped hundreds of entrepreneurs/startups/consultants grow Linkedin brand & Business online:

-unlocking the UVP
-build content that generate leads 
-generated over $3.5 million dollars worth leads. 

In my BrandScale agency, we offer done-for-you and done-with-you services + personal brand building consultancy. 

In Brandscale Academy, I work with coaches, consultants, freelancers and small business to build a high ticket revenue model + predictable system to generate consistent cash.

ðŸ“ŒMy background:

In 2012, I landed in USA from India. I had a plan to do another MBA from an elite university and get placed in corporate America and live my dream life.

World came crashing down when I got divorced in a short marriage leading to developing mental health disorders including depression.

Long story short, while I was on the path of healing myself especially my emotional being, I also felt a surge to explore my real potential. 

As much as I was leaning on for even a highly paid secure job, my heart was gravitating to share my story and build my Executive Stress Management coaching practice.

So, I started building my brand on LinkedIn in early 2019. 

And the results were pretty amazing.

In just 12 months I grew from zero followers to over 25,000.

Since that day, I've coached thousands through my online coaching programs and one-on-one consultations. 

Because I built my one-person business online, people wanted me help them launch & grow their online business. 

My mission is to simplify Branding & Marketing for entrepreneurs, founders and start ups. 

This includes: 

ðŸ‘‰Personal branding & positioning - 100%
ðŸ‘‰AI tools & Strategies -100%
ðŸ‘‰Lead Generation on LinkedIn & Beyond
ðŸ‘‰Leadership Content - To create impact & authority 
ðŸ‘‰Sales Process & Consultation 
ðŸ‘‰ Monetization Strategies to scale faster 

My results:

â†’ Multi 6 figure+ in business revenue & scaling fast
â†’ 100,110+ people following my journey on LinkedIn
â†’ 22k+ people following my journey on Instagram
â†’ 23k+ people read my weekly newsletter
â†’300M+ impressions in the last 4 years
